name: Lover Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:Luscious Fig, Flirtatious Jasmine Sambac, Arousing Oud.Fragrance Description:The Maker’s Lover Eau de Parfum is a hypnotic, woody scent that evokes a warm embrace. Creamy sandalwood, luscious fig, and sparkling vetiver blanket the skin while layered notes of jasmine sambac, narcissus, and a whisper of oud slowly reveal themselves like desires between lovers..About the Bottle:Inspired by an antique ink flask, the bottle is sensuous, smooth, and comfortable to hold with fluted glass panels. Ribbed glass is a signature look seen throughout The Maker Hotel, from fragrance and candles to glassware and lighting fixtures. Made with post-consumer-recycled glass, The Maker uses 27 percent less glass than traditional perfume bottles and C02-free production methods..About the Fragrance:Both grounding and magnetic, this gender-inclusive fragrance was inspired by the unrelenting bond between two lovers.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Eau), Citronellol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray the fragrance on your wrists, shoulders, or neck to create a personal fragrance aura. .-When pairing multiple scents, apply them to different areas of your body and let the fragrances gradually come together..-Do not press your wrists together after application or spray two fragrances on the same spot. It will destroy the composition. ..Recycling Instructions:.Each part of The Maker perfume bottles can be recycled within your home recycling bin by following these steps: .-Remove the cap, made of Zamak, and recycle with aluminum metals..-Unscrew the spray pump, pull out the plastic tube, and recycle with plastics..-Recycle the pump with aluminum metals. .-Recycle the glass bottle with glass. .-All of The Maker boxes are made with FSC-certified board and can be recycled with paper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Utterly obsessed with this fragrance! It’s complex and unique and I found myself smelling my wrist over the course of the day over and over again. It starts off with an earthy fig that fades and blends into this gorgeous clean green yet musky scent. Lover is definitely one that will turn heads and make others ask what you are wearing. I only sprayed once and it lasted all day, so it is potent without the silliage being overbearing. I ordered the discovery kit to start but I will absolutely be ordering the full size because I can’t live without it.

reviews.review_title: Not for me and I’m a fig lover.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me nice for a man however. I prefer more jasmine less woody. This is very similar to Dyptique Phylosikos which I love. It’s also extremely strong I cannot wash it off with Dawn dish soap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: That perfume is so good, unisex. And I got so many compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lover Eau de Parfum, is such a great and mature scent. Something that is worn on a night out type of situation. However, it is very strong, so a little does go a long way. I was also very satisfied by how long lasting it was!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so nice!! The first week I wore it, I seriously got so many compliments. My scent is not something I get complimented for, but this perfume changed that for me. It is also very long lasting!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this has easily become one of my new go to scents!! Every time i have worn this since getting it i have gotten sooo many compliments.. the key notes of fig and oud blend so perfectly its the best night time going out perfume im absolutely in love

reviews.review_title: This scent just makes me feel good !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I paid and bought the mini size to try out (I didn't get it for free to review). I love it! it's not my usual scent, I normally go for sweet  coconut/vanilla type or straight up rose scents but something about this perfume just got to me. It smells so good it puts me in a better mood. It's warm and woodsy, perfect for fall/winter. Plus the quality is excellent, it's super long lasting and strong without being too much. I don't wear it everyday but I keep it in my purse for whenever I'm having a rough day or just need a pick me up, it always cheers me up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maker Lover Eau De Parfum is an enchanting escape bottled in fragrance form. From the moment I spritzed it on, I felt as if I had been whisked away to a dreamy, far-off destination, one where sunsets linger and every moment feels full of possibility. The inspiration behind this fragrance “a travel fantasy” comes through beautifully in its layered, evocative scent. The top note of luscious fig greets you with a ripe, juicy sweetness that feels like a warm embrace. As it settles, the flirtatious allure of jasmine sambac blooms, adding an airy yet intoxicating floral heart. The base is where the magic deepens, with sensual vetiver and arousing oud creating a rich, smoky warmth that lingers delicately on the skin. Wearing this fragrance made me feel confident, playful, and undeniably alluring, as though I were stepping into the role of a worldly adventurer with stories to tell. It’s a scent that evokes wanderlust and reminds me of places I’ve loved or long to visit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately I found the scent to be too woody and masculine for my taste. It is quite strong. Because of this you can’t really wear it for all occasions. The scent lasts for a long time. The woody note is too overwhelming. I wouldn’t it recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so unique! The lover is rich, with musky notes and a touch of sweetness. I can also feel some floral accords. It is very long lasting and I only need one spritz! And I get tons of compliments every time I wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the perfume is such a nice woody scent with fruity and floral notes that i feel like is perfect for date night. i have starting going for this one more often now and i see that i am getting some compliments on it as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Makers Lovers perfume is perfect for anyone. The scent is so warm, rich & woody. Beautiful notes of fig, jasmine sambas, vetiver & oud. Great for the winter holiday months. The scent is very long lasting all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very similar to Billie’s perfume in my opinion! Definitely great unisex perfume & very long lasting. I caught whiffs of it throughout the day. Very complex at first but Dries down very nicely to a woodsy scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful woody scent! It leans sweet and creamy on my skin, and gives me a warm and comforting feeling. The projection is moderate but not overpowering. I also love that it has very impressive longevity - I can still smell it on my skin at the end of the day. This is my first fragrance from them and I'm really impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is so good and perfect for a nice classy evening. The strongest notes are oud and jasmine. It lasts for a while as well and melts into a better luxurious scent after few hours. Few sprays are enough for the whole night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a fantastic perfume for winter!!! This cozy, warm, rich scent is perfect for evenings out over the holidays! So yummy - it is a very unique blend that I have never smelled before. Very long lasting on your clothes/body!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely fragrance. I love how woody, yet not overpowering it is. As someone who identifies as a woman, I appreciate unisex scents. My husband and I share fragrances and I can definitely see him stealing this one. I think it’s a very sexy scent and the name fits it perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you are some who like earthy and woody scents, this will definitely be the scent for you. It is a very musky, woody but sexy scent. The key notes consist of Luscious Fig, Flirtatious Jasmine Sambac, Arousing Oud. I find it interesting how the inspiration was inspired by two lovers. Hence the name of the scent. Makes it seem like there is a true love story behind the scent. The scent does make me feel like I’m at home by the fire having a date night while there’s a winter storm outside.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this perfume is definitely a delicate floral smell. I have grown to love the smell after my second use but prior it felt overpowering. I have been using it on the go quick  for a quick touch up. Pro is that it is Super convenient for on the go. Definitely something different to add to my collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The moment I tried Lover, I was drawn in by its rich, earthy depth. The key notes of luscious fig, flirtatious jasmine sambac, and arousing oud create a warm, inviting scent. It feels cozy, like being wrapped in a soft embrace, but also has this magnetic, sensual quality that slowly reveals itself.  What I love most is how Lover evolves throughout the day—it starts with that deep, woody warmth and then the floral jasmine and creamy sandalwood come through, making it feel both grounding and alluring. The inspiration behind it, the bond between two lovers, really comes through in the way it makes me feel—connected, confident, and a little bit mysterious.  The bottle is beautiful too—smooth, sleek, and eco-friendly, which adds a personal touch to the experience.  Overall, Lover is a timeless, gender-inclusive fragrance that feels both intimate and bold. It’s perfect for anyone who loves warm, woody scents that leave a lasting impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first and immediate response was that there is a strong but earthy smell. I also like that it can be used by men and women since the smell is not very girly or anything. I will be using this daily from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lover Eau de Parfum smells good but I cannot say it’s my favourite scent ever. Personally I’m smelling too many notes at once and It’s kind of throwing me off. Smelling it from a far on my body it smells good but when I spray it onto my wrists and sniff it directly it smells a little spicy which Is not my favourite. The scent did last throughout the day which was good! Overall not my favourite but very good quality perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from @skeepers_us in exchange for my honest review.  The Maker Lover Eau De Parfum. This perfume is an earthy woody scent with hints of fig and jasmine. It’s vegan, cruelty free, contains no formaldehydes, contains no phthalates, and is a clean product.   It is quite a strong perfume. I was quite surprised how strong it is as soon as you spray it. You definitely get the woody scent to it. It reminds me of an earthy scent mixed with strong perfume. It’s not a bad scent, but for me, I may like it if it weren’t so strong. It almost felt a little overbearing. This could just be my scent preference, so I’d definitely recommend still giving it a try! That’s the fun unique part about scents, is there are SO many to try from to suit our personalities! #skeepers #themaker #themakerlover #lovereaudeparfum #perfume #scent #cologne #vegan #clean #fragrance #fig #jasmine #phthalatefree #formaldehydefree #crueltyfree #free #review #productreview

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got to try this luxe perfume. I would definitely agree with this title “Lover”. It reminds me of being swept away off my feet in love. The scent to this is unisex and genderless. I can definitely smell the jasmine, oud, and fig. When you spray it on, it’s very strong but after a few minutes you get a nice woodsy smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great scent, it’s light but fruity and slightly floral & musky. I’m impressed by this scent and it lasts throughout the day. Definitely try it out if you’re looking for a new scent! It also makes a great gift for the holiday season

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lover Eau de Parfum is such a beautiful scent! With notes of velvet rose, creamy musk, and soft vanilla, it feels romantic and sophisticated. It makes me feel confident and elegant, perfect for any occasion. The fragrance lingers nicely without being overpowering, and I love how it blends floral and musky notes for a balanced, lasting impression. Definitely a new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received The Maker's Lover Eau de Parfum in exchange for this post. Lover Eau de Parfum is an enchanting experience in a bottle. From the first spritz, you’re embraced by a deep, almost hypnotic warmth that feels both luxurious and comforting. The scent opens with fig, adding a unique, slightly sweet richness then the jasmine sambac then comes forward, softening the fragrance with a lush, floral elegance. It’s not too overpowering—just enough to add an exotic layer that makes the perfume feel sensual. This fragrance is perfect for anyone who loves woody scents with a twist of sweetness and floral allure. It’s warm enough for evening wear but versatile enough for daytime if you want something that lingers with a quiet, captivating charm. Plus, the fact that it’s vegan, cruelty-free, and made with eco-friendly packaging is a bonus, aligning beautifully with a conscious lifestyle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful scent I absolutely love it especially for the winter, it has a nice musk to it which I really enjoy. Will definitely be stocking up on this again as well as trying more products from the Brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely on the stronger side. I would say it’s unisex but leaning slightly more on the feminine side. I will say, the smell lasts for awhile. The other day, I put on a small spritz and it was potent even for 12 hours afterwards

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is really mesmerizing for the fall. It reminds me of being at the Central Park in New York and the coziness of everything around me. I highly recommend if you’re wanting something soft and warm, but not too much for this season.

This perfume smells so good. I will be using it a lot. The perfume made me feel fantastic. I would recommend it to my friends. It also lasts long and is strong so you don't need a lot.  The bottle will last me a long time,Í

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this perfume since last week, smells really good and makes me feel confident. The smell is delicious, you don’t have to apply too much to smell good and it lasts all day long. I recommend it 100%, it is a 9 out of 10 for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying Lover Eau de Parfum, and it has quickly become one of my go-to fragrances. From the first spritz, I was drawn in by its warm, captivating blend of notes. The scent opens with a soft, inviting touch of bergamot and delicate floral notes, which feel fresh yet deeply romantic. As it settles, the heart notes of jasmine and rose bring a beautifully soft, floral warmth that feels both classic and modern. It’s grounded with hints of sandalwood and musk, adding a cozy depth that’s perfect for day or night.  Wearing Lover truly feels like an experience. It’s more than just a fragrance; it’s a reminder of love and passion, leaving me feeling confident and elegantly wrapped in warmth all day. This scent has a certain timelessness to it, like it could become a signature scent to cherish through all seasons. If you’re looking for a fragrance that embodies love, warmth, and sophistication, Lover Eau de Parfum is a perfect choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re a fan of earthy, grounded scents, this woodsy perfume is an absolute gem! 🌲✨ It opens with a fresh, crisp burst of pine and cedar, like stepping into a lush forest after rain. As it settles, subtle notes of sandalwood and moss come forward, adding warmth and depth, while a hint of smoky vetiver brings a touch of mystery. It’s both calming and invigorating—perfect for anyone who loves the outdoors or wants to bring a little nature into their day. It’s become my go-to scent for fall and winter, adding a cozy, sophisticated touch to any outfit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of woody scent based perfumes and this one, Lover from The maker brand is perfect for my taste. Its a gender inclusive fragrance, which is vegan and cruelty free.  fragrance notes: Top: Fig, Madagascar black pepper , Gurjun Balsam ,Vanilla heart: Narcissus, Suede,Jasmine,Cedarwood  Base: Oud,Vetiver,white sandalwood,Musk The bottle is so elegant and smooth, inspired by the antique ink flask and easy to hold. I love this fragrance and its my go to for day and night use. The fragrance lasts for a long time and its very light but sensual experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a different fragrance that I'm normally used to. There's something so rich about the notes in this perfume, and I immediately got compliments while wearing it! It's probably my most unique fragrance to date.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i woudlnt classify this as a feminine scent at all. it’s very masculine, dark, woody, and smells somewhat like a festive christmas tree scent. i think it smells great, but woudlnt wear it very often/may gift it to my bf

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t expecting to love this scent. I normally gravitate to more fruity sweet scents but this is very woodsy and I love it! It would be great for a date night! I’ve received many compliments on this and it lasts a very long time! I wore it for a night out and the next morning I woke up still smelling it! Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume isn't my usual scent. I would say it's more musky than usual. I can see this being a scent that a male would use because it isn't super feminine. It does linger on the body for a few hours, which is nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lover Eau de Parfum smells so good it has like a wood musk and a sweet smell too it which is nice. Great for a date night get lots of compliments about the fragrance which is a plus. Definitely would buy over and over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely woodsy floral scent! This scent really reminds me of elevated clean girl. The opening is pretty musky and woodsy but the dry down is much more floral. And the projection of this perfume is a beast. I sprayed it on my wrist and my mom said she could smell me from all across the room! The longevity is pretty good too, about 6-8 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is one of my favorite scents.  There's something very familiar with the scent, but yet so distinct at the same time.  I was instantly greeted by the woody scent, but shortly afterwards the Jasmine notes become more apparent.  I love the mix of luscious fig, arousing oud and jasmine sambac.  Definitely a flirtatious scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What an enchanting perfume. This perfume makes me feel famous- it has a very high end feel that is both woodsy and warm. I don’t find it too strong for me. It has a likeable quality that’s flirtatious. My husband says this could be my daily perfume, I would agree. I get sandalwood, jasmine and fig. It lasts quite well on the skin and clothes, most of the day for sure! There is a story behind and scent and bottle which is a really nice touch from a brand- though using this scent, I capture the idea of an intimate embrace and love story. The maker hotel uses inspiration from their hotel. I get elegant and sophisticated vibes wearing this- channeling a celebrity at a hotel haha As someone who typically goes for sweeter perfumes, I actually really enjoy this change. This is technically unisex which I could see, it does intertwine the scents in a very sophisticated way that can be seen from both sides. From the scent, to the brand and the feel, this is a A+ from me! Received from Skeepers Canada in exchange for my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this scent, it's unlike any other fragrance I own! I am more of a warm vanilla or a sweet gourmand lover but the alluring notes of luscious fig, flirtatious jasmine and arousing od are captivating. I noticed the warm woody notes after it dried down but initially it presents more of a musk. I will say the staying power is pretty impressive and I will definitely repurchase to switch things up in my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: haven’t been this impressed by a fragrance in a long time, but The Maker Lover Eau de Parfum is truly something special. It’s luxurious and elegant, with a scent that draws compliments every time I wear it. The fragrance has a unique, refined quality that feels timeless but also fresh. I love how it’s not overpowering, yet it lasts beautifully throughout the day. If you're looking for something classy and memorable, I’d highly recommend giving this one a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lover Eau de Parfum by The Maker Fragrances feels like a warm, cozy hug in a bottle. It has a rich, woodsy scent that’s both comforting and a little mysterious, perfect for anyone who wants to smell grounded and intriguing. This fragrance lasts really well throughout the day, starting off strong and then settling into a softer, warm scent that sticks close to you. It’s an ideal pick if you’re after something that feels comforting yet captivating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wait for the dry down to really enjoy the fragrance. The initial smell is a bit musty but once it settles, it smells really fresh and slightly floral. I don’t smell the fig, but I do get notes of florals. Not sure if it’s worth getting the full size to be honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This isn’t for me, but I love smell. Here’s why: When I first sprayed this, I knew it wasn’t something that I would wear, however, I kept smelling what I sprayed it on throughout the day. It’s a creamy, woody scent and to me, the vetiver and oud really stand out. I’m not one to wear woody scents, but I would love to smell this on my boyfriend, if I had one, lol. I would 100% buy this for your husband, boyfriend, whoever. Alternatively, if you’re a woman who loves woody scents, you’ll love this. It is very strong and the lasting power is amazing. I sprayed it on a piece of paper and could smell it days after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really liked this perfume. I usually go for something rosey or on the vanilla side, but this was very woody and warm. I like how you only need one spray to last you through the day. Love this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this fragrance. To me it smells like a nice bourbon. But, without the alcohol scent. It’s very much unisex which I love. It’s not to masculine or to feminine. I felt like the scent lasted awhile. I personally always spray it on a thick unscented lotion and that helps with longevity. I I asked people throughout the day and they could smell me. In a good way

The fragrance is very unique and I used this for my graduation as I wanted something special and something to bring back memories in future. Its not too fruity but more of floral for me. It did not give me any headache and the stay was very good as well. I highly recommend this fragrance if you are looking for something to gift your loved ones or something for your special occasion.

reviews.review_title: The perfect warm woody scent for fall and winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Lover Eau De Parfum is the perfect warm woody scent for fall and winter. It's warm, spicy and leathery without being overpowering. Main notes that stand out to me are vetiver and oud. Truly a great unisex fragrance, as a women I love to switch from sweet scents to more warm and masculine scents in the winter and I can already tell I'll be wearing this scent on repeat. Wearing this parfum reminds me of cozy winter nights in a cabin spent by the fire relaxing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gender neutral eau de parfum lover scent from the Maker opens up with sandalwood and fig and dries down more softer, a bit sweeter and cozier with suede and jasmine. There’s also cedar wood and musk as the base notes. Perfect for winter time . Remind me of a stay in the cabin or lounging by my Christmas tree with loved ones. This fragrance is very earthy and warm. Would recommend !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Maker Lover perfume, and I have to say, I’m impressed. The scent is beautifully balanced elegant yet not overpowering. It has a lovely mix of floral and woody notes that linger without being too heavy, which makes it perfect for both day and night wear. The longevity is solid, lasting throughout the day without needing a reapplication. I also appreciate how unique it smells; it's distinctive but still versatile enough for various occasions. Overall, I really enjoyed it and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a refined, well-rounded fragrance. Great scent, woodsy, nice for the holidays and winter. I smell a bit of pine in it as well. It smells floral yet woodsy. Does have a slightly masculine undertone but love the smell for Christmas. I’d recommend this perfume to a friend.

reviews.review_title: Good perfume for dark earthy scent lovers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is good for the winter season! It's a dark earthy, woody scent that is probably better suited for more masucline-identifying individuals. It is quite strong and lasts the whole day, good for wearing out at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Lover Eau de Parfum from The Maker has a very unique scent in my opinion. I’m really big on certain scents and this one for me is too strong, it almost comes off masculine. I tried to step out of my comfort zone based on the notes and woody notes and oud are just not for me I guess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this amazing perfume! It’s so refreshing and delicious and at the same time there’s some spice note in it. People constantly asking me which perfume I’m wearing! And it stays with you for so long, you cannot even feel it but other people do! Definitely will buy another bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Eua the perfum it’s ideal for the winter season, I love to use during the night and the scent it’s really strong, unisex and woody, it’s long lasting, I use during all my day and it smell until night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Lover Eau de Perfume smells so good and is very strong, but not too overbearing! I have been wearing it everyday and I can smell it on me at the end of the day also. I would recommend this to my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This woody unisex perfume has been my go to the past few days. This perfume feel like a hug from a special person. It definitely lasts the whole day and the tiniest spray is all you need. I definitely feel like this could be used by men as well as the scent is unisex in my opinion. I really recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is definitely unisex, it has a strong smell and to me personally I feel like one spray is good enough to last all day. You can smell how earthy and woodsy this scent is right away. It’s more of a warmer fragrance and would recommend wearing it on special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is amazing! With a warm scent that give a autumn cafe day! With Fig, Jasmine, and Oud key notes, this creates a strong but not a headache smell! This smell last a long time and is definitely one of my favorites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lover Eau de Parfum is amazing! It is a hypnotic, woody scent that evokes a warm embrace that people can sense from feet away. I love how it lasts all day and it goes with any outfit. It is truly perfect for any occasion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Lover Eau de Parfum by The Maker Fragrances, and it smells amazing! This woody scent feels warm and inviting, wrapped me in a comforting embrace. It captures the essence of intimacy and connection beautifully. Plus, it’s gender inclusive, making it perfect for anyone. I love wearing it day or night. If you're looking for something that feels both personal and special, I highly recommend giving Lover a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume it could be very versatile and could be for men also which is unisex but the smell is great and musky which i love. A very clean scent and can't go wrong with it it's a very unique smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like a strong woody and musky fragrance then this is the one for you. There are many different elements to this fragrance but you can definitely smell the fig notes as well as the jasmine upon first smell. This is definitely a warmer fragrance but I love to wear it during the colder months, it reminds me of being in a warm and cozy cabin. The scent is very strong and long lasting- I typically only use one to two sprays and I can still smell it at the end of the day. I love that this brand is gender inclusive so that even my boyfriend can use it. It’s also made without parabens, phthalates and formaldehydes which is a huge bonus to me while looking for a new signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lover Eau de Parfum by The Marker, which has a woody fragrance with notes of fig, jasmine, and oud. Its scent is really pleasant; from the moment of application, you can sense the natural aromas, and most importantly, it lasts for hours. However, I feel it suits an older woman better, as I’m 27 and prefer fresh and fruity scents. Nevertheless, I would consider it for special occasions, as it offers a relaxing and natural experience that lingers for a long time. I recommend it to anyone who loves natural and soothing fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sound is so unexpectedly great on my skin and was like floral fresh but also musk and depth had a little bit of maybe santole in its cedar wood, something like that and it just developed on my skin and it lasted a really long time.I was shocked at how strong and put in.It was hours later in the packaging is adorable.The story behind it with the hotel.It's very cool.I will be definitely looking for a more sense from this brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Maker Lover Eau de Parfum is a captivating scent that envelops you in warmth and allure. The luscious fig opens the fragrance with a sweet invitation, leading into the flirtatious jasmine sambac and creamy sandalwood that create a hypnotic embrace. As it develops, notes of narcissus and a whisper of oud reveal themselves, adding depth and complexity. With a touch of sparkling vetiver, this fragrance strikes a perfect balance between sweetness and earthiness. Its longevity is impressive, lasting beautifully throughout the day. The elegant packaging reflects its luxurious essence. Overall, The Maker Lover is a delightful choice for anyone who enjoys woody, sensual scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lover Maker Eau de parfum perfume has such an amazing scent that I've been using it non-stop since I got it. It has a warm, woody, and earthy aroma with standout notes of fig, jasmine, and oud. The fragrance lasts on me all day, and I like layering it with a sandalwood body cream, which complements it perfectly. I'm really enjoying it and might repurchase once I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has incredible lasting power. I can still smell it 12 hours later. The scent to me is very woodsy (as described) but also leathery. If you like that kind of scent, you’ll probably like this. It definitely smells more masculine than feminine though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This enchanting fragrance is inspired by exotic journeys, featuring rich notes of fig complemented by delicate floral undertones. It creates a warm, inviting experience that is perfect for any occasion. The scent leaves a lasting impression without being overwhelming, making it a must-try for anyone looking to elevate their fragrance collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying this brand and i absolutely love it! It is a little different from other woody scents I own, but I honestly don’t think all woody scent lovers are going to like it. It is a little spicier than a regular wood scent, which is why I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst perfume I have ever smell in my life! It smell like incense, I love woody scent but this is not it! You have to smell this in person before you buy it. One good thing I’ll say is long lasting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lover smells like Christmas! The first impression is deeply spicy. On dry down, the base is woody and reminds me of evergreen trees. The fig comes out more as time goes on. I'm not a gourmand girly, so this EDP is perfect for me. Also, this perfume lasts sooo long. I could still smell it faintly at the end of the night after applying it in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the way it smells and the packaging is so beautiful. It smells luxurious and fresh. Surely guves an IT girl vibe. I also really like that this one stays on me for a long period of time. I lay it up with my body cream and it stays for an entire day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maker Lover edp is a well balanced fragrance that feels warm and intimate. It starts with soft florals and a hint of spice, then after a bit, turns into a creamy, woody base that lingers. The scent is perfect for someone who appreciates subtle sophistication, but not too powerful of a scent. It’s strong, but subtle, and dries down very nicely. Overall a great fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume embodies a captivating woodsy aroma that strikes a perfect balance between earthy richness and subtle elegance. I think is perfect for fall . I found that it lasted throughout the day, with just the right amount of sillage to leave a lasting impression without being overpowering. It’s perfect for both day-to-night wear, making it versatile for any occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lover Eau de Parfum smells amazing and has a musky and sweet fragrance all in one.  This beautiful packaged perfume is amazing for use during the day or a night out.  It has a decadent sweet long lasting aroma and lasts long.  I highly recommend as it feels luxurious and sensual at the same time.

reviews.review_title: A great gift and product for the holiday season!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells heavenly! Every time the season changes, especially the shift into winter I always search for a cozy scent to make me feel sophisticated and cozy, “The Lover” by the maker is exactly that scent! I would highly recommend this perfume for anyone looking to add a little bit of luxury into their life. I am not a fan of overly floral and sweet scents, but this scent has a warmer and woody note which I really enjoyed. This scent would also make a perfect gift for the holidays! I know so many people who I would love to get this for! I cannot wait to utilize this perfume through the holiday season!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells nice. It’s more of an older lady perfume honestly. I would buy this for my mom because I prefer more of fruity & sweet scents ! But other than that it smells really nice and perfect for fall !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Can I say how strong scent and lasts long almost for 2 days. I loved how the scent stays in my clothes. And for this price it’s so so worth it. I used to go always for known parfum brands which is not lasts long even a 3 hours . I just buy it girl .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the maker lover eau de parfume first of all it’s really strong scent, a little goes along way. It’s a pretty woodsy, deep and sexy fragrance and I was really impressed by his longevity. definitely and unisex fragrance that in my opinion leads more on a masculine side. Overall I like it but i m going to gift it to my husband since he became obsessed with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lover Eau de Parfum is great but to me it smells more like a home smell. Good to spray around the house. It lasts sooooo long. Its a divine scent and i really enjoy it. I recommend to anyone looking for a long lasting scent…

reviews.review_title: More than just a fragrance, it’s a feeling!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Talk about my new signature scent! Moments after I sprayed it, it felt familiar. It took me back to a place where I didn’t know all the stresses of the world and I felt immediately at ease. It’s on the warmer side of fragrances with fig and vetiver which is perfect for fall. This is so good, I wore it to bed and haven’t put it down since!

I bought a travel size of this to try out for $42. It smells like straight up Christmas tree and the spray barely comes out of the bottle. I've bought other travel size perfumes before that are much bigger. Would honestly not recommend this perfume unless you want to smell like you just left a Christmas tree farm and are covered in sap. The kicker is I cant even use it if I wanted to because the spray nozzle barely works at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is hypnotic. It is VERY strong, so a little goes a long way, and it can be slightly off-putting at first. The initial scent is very woody and sharp, but it is the only perfume I’ve worn that gets better throughout the day. By the end of the day, it’s an intoxicatingly sweet, woodsy fig with vanilla. I have never smelled something like it. I would suggest the trial size to determine if it mixes well with your chemistry, and give it a sniff through out the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. It was strange at first but it's a truly unisex scent that lasts a long time but feels grown up. It is hard to explain. Most perfume doesn't last on me, but this I do smell several hours later (in small whiffs). I am usually not fond of woodsy scents, but this is blended so well that I just feel for it. I went through a small sample and travel size before buying the full bottle. That almost never happens to me bc I have a lot of fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: purchased from Scentbird, smells like bug spray. disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as part of the Mother’s Day sample bag, and I was immediately drawn to it. You don’t need too much, otherwise it can be overpowering. It’s woodsy, romantic, and fairy-like. I feel like a goddess wearing it. Going to buy the full size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not my vibe. It smells like strong incense. The woody vibe is more like a flee market. Hard to sort out why you’ll hate it, but you’ll hate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Found this to be very masculine (woody, spicy sweet) and I didn't enjoy wearing it. However, I did make my husband spray this on himself and wow does it smell amazing on him! Very... Tom Ford F'ing Fabulous vibes. The price for the travel size is a bit off-putting and I'm not sure what warrants the $10 price increase over regular travel sizes from other top designers. This is a green and environmentally responsible fragrance company but that's not unusual in the industry anymore and plenty of green companies have more affordable 10mL options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is in my top 5 (I own over 600 scents). Deep, dark, yet smooth and sexy. Just beautiful.
smells SO good but the bottle is extremely fragile. I brought it on a trip and it shattered in my purse. Such a bummer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent. But for $42 I at least expect it to be filled completely. This is a ripoff. Will be returning.

reviews.review_title: Total Earth Fae Vibes, Complex and Seductive.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous, complex scent that blends well with the right environment. I can see why some might think it’s overly powerful and masculine. At first, those were my first impressions as well. I decided to wear it for the day and am so very glad I did. With body heat and the right body chemistry, it transforms into a sweet sensual and seductive scent that made me feel like an earth fairy queen. I’m so glad I received this sample for the Mothera Day gift, I’m definitely purchasing a  full size.

reviews.review_title: All-time Favourite!!  Don't be too quick to judge!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a sample size of this blind from a fragrance subscription.  After wearing it 3 times, I HAD to buy the full bottle!  It changes while wearing it throughout the day, which makes me love it even more.  It makes me feel super sexy and confident - not an easy feat for a 50 year old mom of 3 teens!  DON'T base your opinion of those fragrance on spraying it in the air or on a tester card.  All you'll smell is the woodsy side.  It needs body temperature to evolve into its true marvelousness.  Wait 10 minutes after a light spritz before sniffing.  Then enjoy how it changes as the day goes on.   My partner LOVES how it smells on me.  I can't wait to see how it changes on him!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and sprayed one spray on my arm. I immediately regretted even that one spray... it is one of the worst-smelling fragrances I have had the unpleasant experience of smelling. It is so woody and masculine, but it a bad way. I had to write a review it is so bad.

reviews.review_title: Smells so pretty, great for day or night
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume and get so many compliments when I wear it! I’ve had full size bottles of other scents for years but I’m blazing through the sample size. smells  feminine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's not a scent I would wear. Kinda smells like Lysol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Immediately after spraying this I felt transported back to the Cosmo in Vegas, but sans the cigarette smoke! Holy moly, this is a cool scent. Sexy and strong but not overpowering. It is earthy but still seductive. I am a fan and would buy a larger bottle 1000%. It does smell like a less intense version of what the Cosmopolitan Hotel smells like, which I realize is niche but it's super true.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample of this and it was an immediate “absolutely not” for me. Don’t even want to try it on my skin. Smells like the garden section of Home Depot to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found the oud overpowered all the other notes, so this just smelled like an old church to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received sample of this recently. This is blended beautifully and very unique. Definitely unisex and I can see why many think this pulls masculine which is not something I typically reach for but surprisingly something about this I loved. The oud is very prominent but light fig note (which is more noticeable in dry down) gives it subtle sensual sweetness. I can see why some feel it’s a scrubber for those noses that are more inclined to generic heavily commercialized common fragrances that are not as complex. My husband complimented right away. I live in Miami and this surprisingly did well in heat but definitely see it performing better as fall/winter scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in the mothers day samples. As soon as I sprayed it, it was super strong and just yukk not my kind of perfume. Not sweet one bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this for the Mother’s Day Promotion. As a perfume collector and hobbyist, I can appreciate different fragrances, but this one was a total scrubber for me. I detect zero fig in this. The opening is an extremely smokey, campfire-like oud. The dry down softens a bit, although this is not for everyone and definitely not crowd pleasing. I would consider this unisex at best. Try in store first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and sprayed one spray on my arm. I immediately regretted even that one spray… it is one of the worst-smelling fragrances I have had the unpleasant experience of smelling. It is so woody and masculine, but it a bad way. I had to write a review it is so bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: smells really good. I'm going to get a bigger one would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can appreciate this scent for its woody vibes and think it would be nice in the fall / autumn but it leans a bit too masculine for me. It reminds me of sitting around a campfire at night under the stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little different, smells better on my skin than on my clothes. I’m glad I got the travel size to see if the scent grows on me more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted this to be more jammy with the fig and vanilla but it just smells old lady hair spray on me. It's in the return pile unfortunately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after seeing an influencer saying it smells like a warm cozy hug, and seeing the fig note. Sadly, this smells nothing like I thought it would (very very woody) and I gave it away to a friend who didn’t like it either lol

reviews.review_title: Different than anything I’ve tried in the best way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I saw another review that said it’s a rollercoaster of a fragrance and it is in the best way. My favorite perfume is Nest’s Indigo and I was excited to try this one. For me, it definitely leans more masculine, but I would 1000% turn my head back around to see who was wearing it. It’s a very sexy fragrance that I will be giving to my boyfriend to try. You can tell it’s a high quality fragrance immediately. One spritz in the air and I could smell it throughout the room. Lovely fragrance, just not feminine enough for my liking, but I will be trying it myself as well to see if it could eventually be!! Fresh, woodsy, clean yet sensual. I imagine the hottest person in a romance book would wear this. My cat also could not stop sniffing the air?? Lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this scent through a monthly subscription box; it was something I picked out to receive, it wasn't sent randomly.  I should love it, I love all the notes in it (especially the fig), but I don't.  It's not bad, it's just not great on my body chemistry.  The oud comes out strong and overpowers everything else.  It also doesn't have a lot of staying power, so I can't really tell what it would smell like after the top note of oud fades away.  Maybe it smells nicer, but who knows, because I can't smell it at all.  Could just be my chemistry, though.  If you like these notes, I suggest you get a sample or a travel size bottle first.  It isn't what I expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance -- it completely lives up to its name and smells very romantic! When I use Lover, I feel sensual and comforted. It strikes a perfect balance of floral, woody, and slightly powdery. It also lasts very well. I received this product to be reviewed.
